Uses of Package
org.terrier.applications

  • Packages that use org.terrier.applications 
    Package Description
    org.terrier.applications
    Provides application-level code that use the Terrier platform to perform indexing and retrieval from either standard test collections, interactive querying of a indexed collection, or desktop search.
  • Classes in org.terrier.applications used by org.terrier.applications 
    Class and Description
    BatchIndexing
    Abstract class for all code that set up the batch indexers
    TRECIndexing
    This class creates the indices for a test collection.
